description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Intercompany_ProfileObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Intercompany_ProfileObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

validation.validation: Either Intercompany Allowed or Intercompany Settle Only can be selected but not both.

Intercompany_Profile_Data.description: The default payment type for the intercompany profile.

When this is checked, assets are transferred to the transfer-to company with the same in-service date, total asset cost and accumulated depreciation as the asset in the transfer-from company.When not checked, assets are transferred to the transfer-to company with asset cost equal to the net book value and the in-service date is specified in the transfer-to company.
Option to automatically record intercompany receipt after settlement run.

Intercompany_Profile_Data.description: Reference to bank account for recording intercompany receipt.

validation.validation: Default Payment Type : [1] must be included in the list of valid payment types
In order to check the option to Transfer Asset Original, intercompany transactions must also be allowed.
The bank account selected is not a valid for the selected companies.
You must enable Record Intercompany Receipts to add a Bank Account for Intercompany.
Select a bank account to record an intercompany receipt.
Leave Bank Account for Intercompany Receipt blank or empty when you specify Record Intercompany Receipt as false.
Leave these fields blank or empty when you specify Initiate Allowed and Settle Only as false: Bank Account, Default Payment Type, Payment Type.
Leave Transfer Asset as Original blank or empty when you configure an intercompany profile to Settle Only.
